reviews.author: Robert P.
reviews.comment: The presentation of the meal felt carefully organized and was very tasty!

reviews.author: William L.
reviews.comment: I loved the aesthetic of the restaurant. The backlit aquarium on the side of the table was a very nice touch. It provided a bit of entertainment!

reviews.author: Karen L.
reviews.comment: Their food is amazinggg!!! Although there was a bit of a wait for the food to come to our table, it was definitely worth the wait. The staff was also kind and understanding to our specific dietary needs and refined their meals accordingly. Very considerate of them, truly.

reviews.author: Eri V.
reviews.comment: I like the cozy vibe that this place gives off. I've been a frequent customer and they have yet to disappoint me. I doubt they will.

reviews.author: Carlos Y.
reviews.comment: Great place to take the family out to eat for the night. The kids loved the aquariums!
